body.text: I'm not sure how that makes your biological father adopting you necessary. Isn't this usually a different legal process?
I'm not sure how that makes your biological father adopting you necessary. Isn't this usually a different legal process?
I don't understand why your bio dad would need to legally adopt you though? Do you mean got custody? Terminated mom's parental rights?
I kept reading it as, “My dad legally adopted my mom” and I was having a very confusing image in my head at first.
I'm not sure how that makes your biological father adopting you necessary. Isn't this usually a different legal process?
So he didn't throw momma from the train?
Wait a minute, they made a movie of that .. 'Throw Momma From The Train', starred, um, Danny DeVito I think.
